question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding temple building in Vijaynagara kingdom?
1. There was an elaboration of the temple complex by the addition of a number of structures. 
2. The shrine of the chief goddess (ammankoil) and the kalyanamandapam were considered to be indispensable parts of           temples.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: There was an elaboration of the temple complex by the addition of a number of structures in the temples of Vijayanagara empire. The shrine of the chief goddess (ammankoil) and the kalyanamandapam were considered to be indispensable parts of temples.
